TestSuite.name: Preparation
TestSuite.Description:
1)Login info - create file common.h in spml/include directory and defines PGW_IP,PGW_PORT_SPML,PGW_PORT_SPML_NSR and PGW_PORT_DSML used by SUBSCRIBER Creation and deletion scripts.
2)SPML File Compilations - Compiled and build "*.its" in spml
3)copy ac.spml and subdata.spml from TestCases/HI45_03291_11_005/ to spml/spml001/ and run "*.cfg" to create subscriber.
4)copy ac.spml and subdata.spml from TestCases/HI45_03291_11_008/ to spml/spml001/ and run "*.cfg" to create subscriber. 3rd and 4th step execute using perl script
############################### Subscribers in this suite ####################################### 1. A Normal subscriber sub1 [262020391211001,491720391211001] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry. 2. A Normal subscriber sub2 [262020391211002,491720391211002] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry. 3. A Normal subscriber sub3 [262020391211003,491720391211003] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry.Also provide FollowMe. 4. A Normal subscriber sub4 [262020391211004,491720391211004] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFU and FollowMe .
5. A TIF Subscriber sub5 [262020391211005,491720391211005] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB, CFNrc and CFNry. 6. A TIF Subscriber sub6 [262020391211006,491720391211006] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB, CFRNrc and CFNry. 7. A TIF Subscriber sub7 [262020391211007,491720391211007] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB, CFNrc and CFNry.Also and FollowMe. 8. A TIF subscriber sub8 [262020391211008,491720391211008] with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFU and FollowMe .
9. Linked IMSI subscribers sub9[262020391211009,491720391211009] and sub10 [262020391211010,491720391211010] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry.Also procide followme for both subscribers. 10. Twin card subscribers sub11[262020391211011,491720391211011] and sub12 [262020391211012] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry for master.Also procide followme for for master 11. Janus subscribers sub13 [262020391211013, 491720391211013], sub14[262020391211014, 491720391211014] and sub15[262020391211015, 491720391211015] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry .Also procide followme for all subscribers. 12. HLR based multism subscribers sub16[262020391211016, 491720391211016] , sub17[262020391211017],sub18[262020391211018],sub19[262020391211019].sub20[262020391211020].sub21[262020391211021],sub22[262020391211022],sub23[262020391211023],sub24[262020391211024], and sub25[262020391211025] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB for master.Also provide followme for master. Nominate master for speech, slave1(sub17) for FAX and slave2(sub18) for CDA. 13. MSS based subscribers sub26[262020391211026, 491720391211026], sub27[262020391211027, 491720391211027], sub28[262020391211028, 491720391211028], sub29[262020391211029, 491720391211029] and sub30[262020391211030, 491720391211030] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB. Also provide follow me for the subscribers.
#################################################################################################################

TestCase.name: TC3912_001
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_001
Goals: 1. To verify whether the global translation is done when ftnTranIndex value is not present for a subscriber with no TIF-CSI. 2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(91765123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (91491720391211003). 3. Also verify that matchNextStep is executed when a match is found with the RegEx string.
Note : 91 refers to the FTNO's InfoByte: International
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet1.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet1" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 5 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule1.
3.Rule1 with nbrRegExp "12" and action to ""replace"" the target(match) with string "172" and refNextStepId as "Rule2"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule2 which has nbrRegExp ""765"" and action ""prefix"" the target(match) with string ""49"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule3 which has nbrRegExp "9149",and action ""Replace"" the target(match) with string "9048" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on Regex Non-match.
Subscriber : ftnTransIndex is not present for the subscribers(sub1, sub2 , sub3, sub4) .
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (765123) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (765123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber4 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub1),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub4) requests are successful and global translation is applied on the FTNO. 2. Rule1 & Rule2 are executed and translated FTNO is "497651723" for SCI(RSS) & ATM. 3. Rule1 & Rule2 are executed and translated FTNO is "4917203917245" for USSD.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub1) | | | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | UL(sub2) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | | | UL(sub3) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub4) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(765123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(497651723) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (765123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(497651723) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4917203917245) | |<-----------------------------------|

EvaluationFile.successkeyword: "Done file" "!Error in file"

"SUCCESS" "!***ERR" "!parameter error(s) occured" "!Testcase failed " "!Test case : FAILURE Incorrect USSD string" "!userException" "!In Service Time Out" "!Connection refused" "!Can't load compiled control file" "!XMLSign failed" "Number of Scripts : 8"
"Test Case Passed" "!Test Case Failed" "!userException" "!In Service Time Out" "!Connection refused" "!Can't load compiled control file" "!XMLSign failed"

TestCase.name: nbrRuleSetName change
TestCase.Description:
Test case: H40UB131 Title: ATM: LUP done from Supercharged VLR . Active state of CFU is again activated through ATM.
Priority: 1
Purpose: To verify that SubscriberAI part of AgeIndicator is not getting incremented when already active CFU is again activated by ATM.
Pre-requisite: 1] Create a simple GSM subscriber with CFU to Speech in ACTIVE state . 2] The following feature flags are true in HLR-FE superCharger superChargerActive 3] Successful LUP is performed on the subscriber from a superCharged VLR. 4] GSM-SCF address is present in the allowedGSMSCFTable and ATMAllowed is set to true.
Execution:
1] Perform ATM request on the Subscriber to activate CFU.
Expected Results: 1] Verify that ATM response is successful. ISD is NOT triggered to the VLR since CFU was already active for the subscriber and AI is not changed in DB.
Message Flow:
GSM-SCF HLR | | | ATM | |--------------------------------------------->| | | . | R_ATM | |<---------------------------------------------| | | | | | | | | References: 1] P30308-A3180-H360-02-76J1 -FRQ96759 HLRd: Supercharger
2] HD40.96759.SuperCharger.updateAgeIndicator.ADM
*******************************************************************************************************

EvaluationFile.successkeyword: "Test Case Passed" "!Test Case Failed" "!userException" "!In Service Time Out" "!Connection refused" "!Can't load compiled control file" "!XMLSign failed"

TestCase.name: TC3912_002
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_002
Goals: "1. To verify whether the global translation is done when ftnTransIndex value(0) is attached for a subscriber with no TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with FTNO(8149150023) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (81491720391211003).
3. Also verify that NonMatchNextStep is executed when a non-match is found with the RegEx string. Note: i) InfoByte 81 - Unknown ii) InfoByte 91 - International"
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
"1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet2.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet2"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule4
3. Rule4 with nbrRuleInputType is a ""token"" and nbrRegExp "91%MSISDN%" and nbrModType to "replacewithToken" the nbrModTarget(match) with string "91%MSISDN2%"; refNextStepId as ""Rule5"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule6"" on regEx nonmatch. On nonmatch, execute nonmatch action ( replacewithtoken) on target(whole) with predefined token %MSISDN%.
4.Rule5 which has nbrRegExp ""11"" and nbrModType ""prefix"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string ""22"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule6 which has nbrRegExp ""^49"", nbrModType to "prefix" string "9148" on target(whole) nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"", and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
6. longFTNOSupported=true
note: %MSISDN% is predefined token" %MSISDN2% is DEFTOKENLIST with value as "491720391211002"
Subscriber: 1. ftnTransIndex value=0 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3, sub50).
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49150023) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49150023) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber50 with FTNO (491720391211050) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results "1. RSS(to activate CFNry for sub2),ATM(CFB for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub4 from sub3 to sub4) requests are successful and global translation is applied on both the FTNO. 2.Rule4& Rule6 are executed and the translated FTNO is ""48491720391211002"" for SCI(RSS) & for ATM the translated FTNO is "48491720391211003". 3.Rule5 are excecuted and the translated FTNO is "48491720391211050" for USSD."

VLR HLR-FE

TestCase.name: TC3912_003
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_003
Goals: 1. To verify whether the global and the Configured rules are applied, when ftnTransIndex value(3) is attached for a subscriber with no TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with Unknown FTNO(8182003) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with an unknown FTNO (81491720391211051).
Note: i) InfoByte 81 - Unknown
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: "1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet3 and for nbrContextType=2 with nbrTransIndex value=1 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet4.
2.A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet3"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 5 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule7. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet2"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule9.
3. Rule7 with nbrRegExp ""03$"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string ""572"";refNextStepId as ""Rule8"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
4.Rule8 which has nbrRegExp ""057"" and nbrModType ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string ""157"" and nextStepType as ""finish"", nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule9 which has nbrRegExp ""81"" and nbrModType ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string ""91""and nextStepType as ""finish"", nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch. "
Subscriber-Data: 1. ftnTransIndex value =4 is attached to the subscribers(sub1, sub2,sub3, sub51). Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber3 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (82003) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (82003) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber51 with FTNO (491720391211051) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results: 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub3),ATM(to activate CFB for sub1),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub4) requests are successful and global translation is applied on the FTNO. 2. Global rules and configured rules are applied on the Unknown FTNO & it is translated to International format(821572) for SCI(RSS) & ATM. 3. Global rules and configured rules are applied on the FTNO for USSD& the translated FTNO is "4917203912111572".
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub50) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(82003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(821572) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (82003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(821572) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211051) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(48491720391211050) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_006 -- TIF
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_006
Goals: 1. To verify whether the global and the Configured rules are applied, when ftnTranIndex value=6 is present for a subscriber with TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with the FTNO(49172123)& Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211007).
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=3 with nbrTransIndex value=0 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet7 and for nbrContextType=4 with nbrTransIndex value=6 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet8.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet7" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 5 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule13. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet8" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule14.
3. Rule13 with nbrRegExp "49[0-9]{3}" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(match), where delCharCount=3 and refNextStepId as "Rule12" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule14 with nbrRegExp "007" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(match), where delCharCount=1 and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and nbrModType to "Postfix" the nbrModTarget(Whole), with the string "45" and refNextStepId as ""Rule15"" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule15 which has nbrRegExp "^80" and nbrModType "Replace" the nbrModTarget(match) with string "91" and nextStepType as "finish",nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Note: Rule12 with nbrRegExp "49" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(match), where delCharCount=2 and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, and nbrModType to "Replace" the nbrModTarget(Whole), with the string "905012345612345678123" and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch
Subscriber-Data: 1. ftnTransIndex value =6 is attached to the subscriber(sub5, sub6 , sub7, sub54) with TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber5 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber6 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber7 sends USSD msg to subscriber54 with FTNO (491720391211007) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 7),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 7),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub7 to sub 54) requests are successful . 2. Global rules as well as configured rules are applied . 3.Rule13 , Rule14& Rule15 are executed and the translated FTNO is "123" for SCI(RSS) & ATM.The Rule4 & Rule5(nbrContextType=2) are applied and the registered FTNO is "12345". 4.Rule13 , Rule14 are excecuted and the translated FTNO is "0391211007" for USSD.The Rule4 & Rule5(nbrContextType=2) are applied and the registered FTNO is "039121100"
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub54) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(12345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(12345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211007) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(039121100) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_007
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_007
Goals: "1. To verify that only the existing HIC checks & FTNO conversions are applied on a subscriber when Feature Flag is OFF.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with Unknown FTNO(820031203) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003). "
HLRFE-FF:OFF PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet9.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet9" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule16.
3. Rule16 which has nbrRegExp "\z0?3" and nbrModType "Replace" the nbrModTarget(match) with string "490" and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success", and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Subscriber-Data: 1.ftnTransIndex value =0 is attached to the subcriber(sub1,sub2,sub3, sub55). Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (820031203) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (820031203) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber55 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results "1. RSS(to activate CFB for sub 1),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub 55) requests are successful.

TestCase.name: TC3912_008
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_008
Goals: 1. To verify that only the existing HIC checks & FTNO conversions are applied on a TIF subscriber when Feature Flag is OFF.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with the FTNO(49172123)& Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211007).
HLRFE-FF:OFF PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=3 with nbrTransIndex value=0 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet10 and for nbrContextType=4 with nbrTransIndex value=8 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet11.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet10" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 5 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule13. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet11" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule12.
Note: 3.Rule13 with nbrRegExp "49[0-9](3)" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(match), where delCharCount=3 and refNextStepId as "Rule12" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule12 which has nbrRegExp "49" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(match), where delCharCount=2 and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regExmatch, and nbrModType to "Replace" the nbrModTarget(whole), with string "905012345612345678123" and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch
Subscriber-Data: 1. ftnTransIndex value =8 is attached to the subscriber(sub5, sub6 , sub7, sub56) with TIF. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber7 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber6 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber7 sends USSD msg to subscriber56 with FTNO (491720391211007) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 7),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub7),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub7 to sub56) requests are successful .
2.Existing translations and HIC checks are applied on the FTNO.
3. Global rules are not applied.Therefore the registered FTNO's are ""49172123"" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "491720391211007" for USSD.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub56) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172123) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172123) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211007) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211007) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: ftnTransIndex change to "15"
TestCase.Description:
Test case: H40UB131 Title: ATM: LUP done from Supercharged VLR . Active state of CFU is again activated through ATM.
Priority: 1
Purpose: To verify that SubscriberAI part of AgeIndicator is not getting incremented when already active CFU is again activated by ATM.
Pre-requisite: 1] Create a simple GSM subscriber with CFU to Speech in ACTIVE state . 2] The following feature flags are true in HLR-FE superCharger superChargerActive 3] Successful LUP is performed on the subscriber from a superCharged VLR. 4] GSM-SCF address is present in the allowedGSMSCFTable and ATMAllowed is set to true.
Execution:
1] Perform ATM request on the Subscriber to activate CFU.
Expected Results: 1] Verify that ATM response is successful. ISD is NOT triggered to the VLR since CFU was already active for the subscriber and AI is not changed in DB.
Message Flow:
GSM-SCF HLR | | | ATM | |--------------------------------------------->| | | . | R_ATM | |<---------------------------------------------| | | | | | | | | References: 1] P30308-A3180-H360-02-76J1 -FRQ96759 HLRd: Supercharger
2] HD40.96759.SuperCharger.updateAgeIndicator.ADM
*******************************************************************************************************

Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3

Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 1),ATM(to activate CFB for sub 2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub70) requests are successful.
2. Rule1 & Rule2 are applied and the transalated FTNO is "49876456456" for SCI(RSS) & ATM
3. Rule1 & Rule2 are applied and the transalated FTNO is 491720391211003 for USSD.

TestCase.name: TC3912_029
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_029
Goals: "1.To verify that only global rules are applied on the FTNO in case there is no valid ruleset corresponding to the attached ftnTransIndex value(29) for a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(21734325) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0 with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet25. nbrContextType=2 with nbrTransIndex value=29 & refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet25"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 5 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule30. No valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is created in the database.
3. Rule30 with nbrRegExp ""21"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string ""91"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on RegEx 'Match' and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch .
Subscriber-Data: 1. ftnTransIndex value =29 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3 and sub77) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (21734325) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (21734325) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber65 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNry for sub1),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub4 ) requests are successful and global translation is applied on the FTNO.
2. Only global rules are applied on the National FTNO & it is translated to International format .The translated FTNO's are "49891734325" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "491720391911003" for USSD.
3. Nature of address present in R_RSS,ATM,PUSSR is "International(91)".
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub64) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(21734325) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49891734325) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (21734325) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49891734325) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391911003) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_031
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_031
Goals: 1. Verify that the registration fails if the rule result indicates ""failure"" for a subscriber without TIF.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(56739) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=2 with nbrTransIndex value=31, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet27.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet27"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount=2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule32.
3. Rule32 with nbrRegExp "39" and nbrModType to ""Postfix"" the nbrModTarget(match) with string "78" and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as ""failure""; refNextStepId as "Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch .
Subscriber-Data: 1. ftnTransIndex value =31 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3 and sub4) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (56739) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (56739) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber79 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFNry for sub1),ATM(to activate CFD for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub79) requests fails with UDV.
2.The translated FTNO's are: "5673978" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "49172039781211003" for USSD.
3. Rules for nbrContextType=1 are applied on the FTNO , but Rules for nbrContextType=2 are not applied.Hence registration fails.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub79) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(56739) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(5673978) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (56739) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(5673978) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(49172039781211003) | |<-----------------------------------|

4. Rule34 with nbrRegExp "^9[0-1]" and nbrModType to "PostDelete" the nbrModTarget(PostMatch) delCharCount=5 and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on RegEx 'Match' ; On nonmatch perform nonmatch action on nonmatch target(whole),nbrModType(postdelete) delCharCount=3 and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch .

Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (1234546768003) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (1234546768003) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber65 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFNry for sub2),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub1),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub80) requests fails.
2.Rule34 & Rule 35 is applied and the translated FTNO is "5673". so the resultant ftno has only infobyte portion/FTNO is 0 byte. Hence the registration "Fails" with E_UDV for SCI(RSS) & ATM.
3.Rule34 & Rule 35 is applied and the translated FTNO is "491720391211003". Resultant FTNO is 0 byte. Hence the registration ""Fails"" with E_UDV for USSD.

Notes: %MSISDN% --> predefined token %MSISDN1% --> defaulttokenlist %MSISDN1%= 491720391211004"

TestCase.name: ftnTransIndex change to "35"
TestCase.Description:
Test case: H40UB131 Title: ATM: LUP done from Supercharged VLR . Active state of CFU is again activated through ATM.
Priority: 1
Purpose: To verify that SubscriberAI part of AgeIndicator is not getting incremented when already active CFU is again activated by ATM.
Pre-requisite: 1] Create a simple GSM subscriber with CFU to Speech in ACTIVE state . 2] The following feature flags are true in HLR-FE superCharger superChargerActive 3] Successful LUP is performed on the subscriber from a superCharged VLR. 4] GSM-SCF address is present in the allowedGSMSCFTable and ATMAllowed is set to true.
Execution:
1] Perform ATM request on the Subscriber to activate CFU.
Expected Results: 1] Verify that ATM response is successful. ISD is NOT triggered to the VLR since CFU was already active for the subscriber and AI is not changed in DB.
Message Flow:
GSM-SCF HLR | | | ATM | |--------------------------------------------->| | | . | R_ATM | |<---------------------------------------------| | | | | | | | | References: 1] P30308-A3180-H360-02-76J1 -FRQ96759 HLRd: Supercharger
2] HD40.96759.SuperCharger.updateAgeIndicator.ADM
*******************************************************************************************************

TestCase.name: TC3912_039
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_039
Goals: "1. Verify that for the FTNO the total number of rules executed during number translation is same as MaxRule count of the 2nd ruleset for a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=39 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet35
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet35" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule45.
3. Rule45 with nbrRegExp "AA" and nbrModType to "Replace" nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "1010"; nonmatch action is "postfix" "whole" with "99"; and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx match. and nextStepType as "RuleSet" , refNextStepId as "Ruleset36" on regEx nonmatch.
4. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet36"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule46.
5. Rule46 which has nbrRegExp "BB",and nbrModType to "Replace" nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "1111"; nonmatch action is "postfix" "whole" with "88"; and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx match. and refNextStepId as "Rule45" on regEx nonmatch.
Note: Rule looping ==> can go on infinitely with nonmatch cases"
Subscriber-Data : 1. ftnTransIndex value =39 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3 and sub87) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber87 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub2),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub87) request is sucessful.
2.Rule45 is executed and the Translated FTNO is 914917212399 for SCI(RSS) & ATM .RuleSet36 is executed and Rule45 is executed.Since maxRuleCount =3 for Ruleset36, rule45 is executed again and the number translation stops. Final rtanslated FTNO for the RSS and ATM is 49172123998899
3.Rule45 is executed and the Translated FTNO is 8149172039121100399 for USSD .RuleSet36 is executed and Rule45 is executed.Since maxRuleCount =3 for Ruleet36, rule45 is executed again and the number translation stops. Final rtanslated FTNO for the USSD is 491720391211003998899
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub87) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172123998899) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172123998899) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211003998899) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_040
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_040
Goals: "1.Verify that for the FTNO the number translation is performed and translation stops in case maxrule count of 2nd ruleset is less than or equal to the rulecount executed so far.For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=40 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet37
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet37" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 9 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule47.
3. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet38" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule48.
4. Rule47 with nbrRegExp "A$" and nbrModType to ""PostAdd"" nbrModTarget(whole) with the string "B"; nonmatch action is "postfix" "whole" with "A"; and nextStepType as "RuleSet" , refNextStepId as "Ruleset38" on regEx match. and nextStepType as "Rule", refNextStepId as "Rule47" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule48 with nbrRegExp "[1-9]$" and nbrModType to "PostAdd" nbrModTarget(whole) with the string "A"; nonmatch action is "postfix" "whole" with "9"; and nextStepType as "Rule", refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx match. and nextStepType as "Rule", refNextStepId as "Rule48" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : nonmatch nonmatchnext step same rule and this tym it matches matchnext step Ruleset38, but already two rules executed so exits 8149172123 ==> 8149172123A ==> 8149172123AB
81491720391211003 ==> 81491720391211003A ==> 81491720391211003AB
Subscriber-Data : 1. ftnTransIndex value =40 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3 and sub88) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber88 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub2),ATM(to activate CFD for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub88) request is sucessful.
2.Rule47 is executed twice and the Translated FTNO is "49172123*#"for SCI(RSS) & ATM .RuleSet38(Rule48) is not executed.Because the RuleCount reaches MaxRuleCount of the RuleSet38 after executing the Rule47 twice.
3.Rule47 is executed twice and the Translated FTNO is "491720391211003*#" for SCI(RSS) & ATM .RuleSet38(Rule48) is not executed.Because the RuleCount reaches MaxRuleCount of the RuleSet38 after executing the Rule47 twice.

TestCase.name: TC3912_041 -- LINKED --> DU9155
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_041
Goals: Verify that for a Linked IMSI subscriber, Number translations will be applied when the FTNO(789) for SCI(RSS) & ATM and the FTNO(49172039121100x) for USSD registration request comes on the linked imsi subscriber. The ftnTransIndex and contextType for deriving the ruleSetId will be selected from the requested linked imsis profile.
x can be 9 or 10.
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet39. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=41 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet40
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet39" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 1 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule49. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet40" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule50.
3. Rule49 with nbrRegExp "789$" and nbrModType to "Prefix" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "172" and nonmatch action is "postdelete" delCharCount=3 nbrModTarget(Whole) nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
3. Rule 50 with nbrRegExp "[8-9]1" and nbrModType to "PostAddToken" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "%CC%" and refNextStepId as "Rule51" on regEx match. refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule 51 with nbrRegExp "%CC%%CC%" and nbrModType to "postdelete" the nbrModTarget(Match), delCharCount=2 and NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success"; refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes:
RSS, ATM call flows: match match nonamtch 81789 --> 81172789 --> 8149172789 --> 8149172789
USSD callflow:
nonmatch match match 8149172039121100x --> 81491720391211 --> 8149491720391211 --> 81491720391211"
Subscriber-Data : 1. Linked IMSI subscribers sub9 [262020391211009,491720391211009] and sub10[262020391211010,491720391211010] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry.Also procide followme for both subscribers. 2. nbrTransIndex value=0 is attached to the sub9 3. nbrTransIndex value=41 is attached to the sub10
Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber9 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (789) Subscriber9 sends ATM msg with FTNO (789) Subscriber9 sends USSD msg to subscriber89 with FTNO (491720391211009) to activate FOLLOWME
Subscriber10 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (789) Subscriber10 sends ATM msg with FTNO (789) Subscriber10 sends USSD msg to subscriber89 with FTNO (491720391211010) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results "1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub9),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub9),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub9 to sub89) succeeds. FTNO is translated to ""172789"" for SCI(RSS) & ATM. FTNO is translated to ""81491720391211"" for USSD. Since only global rules are applied for sub9
2. RSS(to activate CFB for sub10),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub10),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub10 to sub89) succeeds. FTNO is translated to ""49172789"" for SCI(RSS) & ATM. FTNO is translated to "4914972039149211" for USSD. Since both global and configured rules are applied for sub10.
3. Also maxrule count is context specifix. so 3 rules(1+2) are executed)"
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE | UL(sub9) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub10) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub89) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(789) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(172789) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (789) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(172789) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211009) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4914972039149211) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | RSS(789) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172789) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (789) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172789) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211010) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4914972039149211) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: empty nbrContextType1 - LDIF
TestCase.Description:
Test case: H40UB131 Title: ATM: LUP done from Supercharged VLR . Active state of CFU is again activated through ATM.
Priority: 1
Purpose: To verify that SubscriberAI part of AgeIndicator is not getting incremented when already active CFU is again activated by ATM.
Pre-requisite: 1] Create a simple GSM subscriber with CFU to Speech in ACTIVE state . 2] The following feature flags are true in HLR-FE superCharger superChargerActive 3] Successful LUP is performed on the subscriber from a superCharged VLR. 4] GSM-SCF address is present in the allowedGSMSCFTable and ATMAllowed is set to true.
Execution:
1] Perform ATM request on the Subscriber to activate CFU.
Expected Results: 1] Verify that ATM response is successful. ISD is NOT triggered to the VLR since CFU was already active for the subscriber and AI is not changed in DB.
Message Flow:
GSM-SCF HLR | | | ATM | |--------------------------------------------->| | | . | R_ATM | |<---------------------------------------------| | | | | | | | | References: 1] P30308-A3180-H360-02-76J1 -FRQ96759 HLRd: Supercharger
2] HD40.96759.SuperCharger.updateAgeIndicator.ADM
*******************************************************************************************************

TestCase.name: TC3912_042 -- TWIN
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_042
Goals: Verify that for a TWIN CARD subscriber, Number translations on the FTNO will be applied using the ruleSetId derived from ftnTransIndex and nbrcontextType of the twincards master imsi profile
1.when the FTNO(999) registration request for master is received for SCI(RSS)& ATM . when the FTNO(81491720391211011) registration for FollowMe request for master is received for USSD .
2.when the FTNO(999) registration request for Slave is received for SCI(RSS)& ATM . when the FTNO(491720391211012) registration for FollowMe request for Slave is received for USSD .
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=42 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet41
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet41" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule52.
3.Rule52 with with nbrRegExp "(9){3}" and nbrModType to "Prefix" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string ""172"" and nonmatch action is "postdelete" delcharcount=3 nbrModTarget(Whole) refNextStepId as "Rule50" on regEx match nextStepId as "finish" with nbrresult as "success"
4. Rule 50 with nbrRegExp "[8-9]1" and nbrModType to "PostAddToken" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "%CC%" and refNextStepId as "Rule51" on regEx match. refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule 51 with nbrRegExp "%CC%%CC%" and nbrModType to "postdelete" the nbrModTarget(Match), delCharCount=2 and NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success"; refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
note: RSS, ATM call flows: match match 81999 --> 81172999 --> 8149172999
USSD callflow:
nonmatch match 81491720391211011 --> 81491720391211 --> 8149491720391211 "
Subscriber-Data : "1. Twin card subscribers sub11[262020391211011, 491720391211011] and sub12 [262020391211012] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry for master.Also provide followme for master 2. ftnTransIndex=111 is attached to the master(sub 10)." Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber11 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (491723987) Subscriber11 sends ATM msg with FTNO (491723987) Subscriber11 sends USSD msg to subscriber65 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Subscriber12 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (491723987) Subscriber12 sends ATM msg with FTNO (491723987) Subscriber12 sends USSD msg to subscriber65 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub11),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub11),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub11 to sub4) succeeds.
1.i )FTNO is translated to "49172999" for SCI(RSS) & ATM request for Master. 1.i i)FTNO is translated to "491720391211" for USSD request for Master.
2. RSS(to activate CFB for sub12),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub12),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub12 to sub4) succeeds.
2.i )FTNO is translated to "49172999" for SCI(RSS) & ATM request for slave 2.i i)FTNO is translated to "491720391211" for USSD request for Slave
Both number translations are same since onlt ftnTransIndex valu attached to subscriber.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE | UL(sub11) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub12) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub90) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211011) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | RSS(999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211012) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_044 -- JANUS
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_044
Goals: 1. Verify that for a Janus subscriber, Number translations will be applied only when the FTNO registration request comes for a Janus Subscriber. The ftnTransIndex and contextType for deriving the ruleSetId will be selected from the requested imsis profile.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(999) for master Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (81491720391211003) for master
3. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(999) for slave 1
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet42. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=45 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet44
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet42" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 1 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule53 . A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet43" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule50.
3. Rule 50 with nbrRegExp "[8-9]1" and nbrModType to "PostAddToken" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "%CC%" and refNextStepId as "Rule51" on regEx match. refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule 51 with nbrRegExp "%CC%%CC%" and nbrModType to "postdelete" the nbrModTarget(Match), delCharCount=2 and NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success"; refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
5.Rule 53 with nbrRegExp "(6){3}|(9){3}" and nbrModType to "prefix" the nbrModTarget(Match), with string "172" and nbrModType to "postdelete" the nbrModTarget(whole),delCharCount=3 for nonmatch and NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success"for regex match; NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success"for regex nonmatch;
Notes: %CC% is a PREDEFTOKEN with 49. RSS, ATM call flows: match match nonmatch 999 --> 17266613999 --> 4917266613999 --> 4917266613999
USSD callflow: nonmatch match match 8149172039121100x --> 81491720391211 --> 8149491720391211 --> 81491720391211"
Subscriber-Data : 1.Janus subscribers sub13 [262020391311013,491720391311013], sub14 [262020391311014, 491720391311014] and sub15[262020391311015, 491720391311015] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry .Also procide followme for all subscribers. 2. ftnTransIndex=0 is attached to the master(sub 13). 3. ftnTransIndex=44 is attached to the slaves(sub14 and sub15).
Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber13 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (999) Subscriber13 sends ATM msg with FTNO (999) Subscriber13 sends USSD msg to subscriber91 with FTNO (491720391211013) to activate FOLLOWME
Subscriber14 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (999) Subscriber14 sends ATM msg with FTNO (999)
Expected Results 1. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(999) for master is successful. FTNO is translated to "49172999" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master.
Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211013) for master is successful. FTNO is translated to "491720391211" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master.
3. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(999) for slave 2 is successful. FTNO is translated to ""49172999"" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE | UL(sub13) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub14) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub91) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211011) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | RSS(999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (999) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172999) | |<-----------------------------------| | |

TestCase.name: TC3912_045 --> DU8650 -- VF Multisim --> DU9155
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_045
Goals: Verify that for a HLR based Multisim subscriber, Number translations will be applied on the FTNO and the ftnTransIndex and nbrcontextType for deriving the ruleSetId will be selected from the multisims master imsi profile.
1.when the FTNO(491724578645) registration request for master is received for SCI(RSS). when the FTNO(80491720391211016) registration for FollowMe request for HLR based multisim master is received for USSD .
2.when the FTNO(491724578645) registration request for Slave is received for ATM.
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet42. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=45 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet44
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet42" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 1 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule53 . A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet44" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule54.
3. Rule 54 with nbrRegExp "45" and nbrModType to "Prefix" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string "123" and nbrModType to "Postfix" the nbrModTarget(Whole) with the string "321" NextstepId as "finish" and nbrResult as "Success" on regex Match; refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes: RSS, ATM call flows: match 90491724578645 --> 90491721234578645
USSD callflow: nonmatch 90491820391211016 --> 90491820391211016321
Subscriber-Data : "1. HLR based multism subscribers sub16[262020391211016, 491820391211016] , sub17[262020391211017] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB for master.Also provide followme for master. Nominate master for speech, slave1(sub17) for FAX and slave2(sub18) for CDA.
2.ftnTransIndex=45 is attached to the master(sub16)."
Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber16 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (491724578645) Subscriber17 sends ATM msg with FTNO (491724578645) Subscriber16 sends USSD msg to subscriber93 with FTNO (491720391211016) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub16),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub17),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub16 to sub93) succeeds.
2.i ). FTNO is translated to "90491721234578645" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for SCI(RSS) request for Master.
2.ii ) FTNO is translated to ""90491820391211016321"" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for USSD request for Master.
3. FTNO is translated to ""90491721234578645"" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for SCI(RSS) & ATM request for Slave
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub16) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub17) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | UL(sub64) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(491724578645) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(491721234578612345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (491724578645) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(491721234578612345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211016321) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_047 -- MSS multisim
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_047
Goals: Verify that for a MSS based MultiSIM subscriber, Number translations will be applied when the FTNO(777) registration request comes on an MSS based multisim subscriber. The ftnTransIndex and contextType for deriving the ruleSetId will be selected from the requested imsis profile.
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet42. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=47 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet46.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet42" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 1 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule53. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet46" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule56.
3. Rule56 with nbrRegExp "27" and nbrModType to "replacewthtoken" the nbrModTarget(postmatch) with the string ""%TOKEN4%"" and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes: 1) Check if both token name and string together can be given for preaddtoken. 2) TOKEN4 in deftokenlist = 8976
Subscriber-Data : "1. MSS based subscribers sub27[262020391211027, 491720391211027], sub28[262020391211028, 491720391211028], sub29[262020391211029, 491720391211029], sub30[262020391211030, 491720391211030] sub31[262020391211031, 491720391211031] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB. Also provide follow me for the subscribers. Group msisdn is sub 32[491720391211032] 2. Default ftnTransIndex is attached to the subcriber(sub 27) 3.ftnTransIndex=47 is attached to the subcriber(sub 28)" Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber27 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (777) Subscriber27 sends ATM msg with FTNO (777) Subscriber30 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (777) Subscriber28 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (777) Subscriber28 sends ATM msg with FTNO (777) Subscriber27 sends USSD msg to subscriber95 with FTNO (491720391211027) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results "1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub27),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub27),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub27 to sub95) succeeds.
2.i ). FTNO is translated to "49172777" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for SCI(RSS) & ATM request for sub27.
2.ii ) FTNO is translated to "491720" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for USSD request for sub27.
3.RSS(to activate CFB for sub28),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub28),RSS(to activate CFB for sub30) succeeds.
4.i ). FTNO is translated to "4917278976" by using ftnTransIndex attached to master for SCI(RSS) & ATM request for sub28 & sub30 for RSS only.
Message Flow

TestCase.name: empty nbrContextType1 - LDIF
TestCase.Description:
Test case: H40UB131 Title: ATM: LUP done from Supercharged VLR . Active state of CFU is again activated through ATM.
Priority: 1
Purpose: To verify that SubscriberAI part of AgeIndicator is not getting incremented when already active CFU is again activated by ATM.
Pre-requisite: 1] Create a simple GSM subscriber with CFU to Speech in ACTIVE state . 2] The following feature flags are true in HLR-FE superCharger superChargerActive 3] Successful LUP is performed on the subscriber from a superCharged VLR. 4] GSM-SCF address is present in the allowedGSMSCFTable and ATMAllowed is set to true.
Execution:
1] Perform ATM request on the Subscriber to activate CFU.
Expected Results: 1] Verify that ATM response is successful. ISD is NOT triggered to the VLR since CFU was already active for the subscriber and AI is not changed in DB.
Message Flow:
GSM-SCF HLR | | | ATM | |--------------------------------------------->| | | . | R_ATM | |<---------------------------------------------| | | | | | | | | References: 1] P30308-A3180-H360-02-76J1 -FRQ96759 HLRd: Supercharger
2] HD40.96759.SuperCharger.updateAgeIndicator.ADM
*******************************************************************************************************

TestCase.name: TC3912_059
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_059
Goals: "Verify that the special short code translation is successful if number translation converts FTNO to a valid shortcode (123/003) , and if shortcode is present in the ""Special short code translation (Watania)"" table,when allowUnknownFTN flag is set to False and splTranslationShortCode is sold and active;For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: "1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=59 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet55.
2.Valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is not created in the database . A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet55"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule65.
3.allowUnknownFTN flag is set to False. 4. splTranslationShortCode is SOLD and ACTIVE.
5. 888 is a valid short code (ie valid NSR is present). 888 short code is present in splShortCodesTable. ndcForSplShortCodeConversion=550 and fillerForSplShortCodeConversion=000
6. Rule65 with nbrRegExp ""4[0-9]{4}"" and nbrModType to ""Delete"" the nbrModTarget(Match) refNextStepId as ""Rule66"" on regEx match. refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule66 with nbrRegExp ""039[0-3]+"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Match) with ""888"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : match nonmatch 8048173888 ==> 90888 ==> 90888 match match 80491720391211003 ==> 800391211003 ==> 80888 7.Rule 4 with nbrRegExp ""3$"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule5"" on regEx nonmatch.
8.Rule5 which has nbrRegExp ""17"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".
9. ndcForSplShortCodeConversion=550 and fillerForSplShortCodeConversion=000 "
Subscriber-Data : 1. ftnTransIndex value =59 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub107) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber107 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results : 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 2),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub107) requests are successful.
2.Rule65 is applied and the translated FTNO is 888(unknown) for SCI(RSS) & ATM. Rule65 and 66 are applied and the translated FTNO is 888(unknown) for USSD.
3.Since the Translated FTNO(888) is and a valid shortcode and present in the ""Special short code translation (Watania)"" table,Then the Translated FTNO is attached with CongifNDC(550) and Filler(000).The converted FTNO will be 49550000444
Remarks: 1.If the short code is present in the ""Special short code translation (Watania)"" table.Then the Registered FTNO is attached with CongifNDC(550) and Filler(000). FTNO = CC + . ndcForSplShortCodeConversion + fillerForSplShortCodeConversion + ShortCode
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub107) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49550000444) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49550000444) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(49550000444) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_048
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_048
Goals: 1. Verify that registration fails with UDV when the translated FTNO is longFTNO and longFTNOSupported feature flag is off for the subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: 1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=48 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet47.
2.Valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is not created in the database . A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet47"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule57.
3. longFTNOSupported is false.
3.Rule57 with nbrRegExp ""[0-9]+"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" nbrModTarget(Whole) with the string ""9149172123456789045860234"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes:
RSS, ATM call flows: match 91491723656 --> 9149172123456789045860234 USSD callflow: match 81491720391211003 --> 9149172123456789045860234
Subscriber-Data : 1. ftnTransIndex value =48 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2,sub3 and sub96) without TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber96 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results "1. .RSS(to activate CFB for sub1),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub96) request is not successful.
2.Rule57 (RuleSet47) is applied and the translated FTNO is ""49172123456789045860234"" which is Long for SCI(RSS) & ATM.Hence E_UDV is returned.
3.Rule57 (RuleSet47) is applied and the translated FTNO is ""49172123456789045860234"" which is USSD. Hence E_UDV is returned."
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub96) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | E_UDV | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | E_UDV | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | E_SF | |<-----------------------------------|

Expected Results " 1. .RSS(to activate CFNRc for sub1),ATM(to activate CFNRy for sub2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub98) request is not successful.
2.Rule57 (RuleSet47) is applied and the translated FTNO is "912131376867543" for SCI(RSS) & ATM.2131376867543 is in PFTNO table. Hence E_UDV is returned.

Pre-requisites: 1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=4 with nbrTransIndex value=52 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet51.
2.A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet51"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule61.
3.Rule60 with nbrRegExp ""12[1-3]"" and nbrModType to ""replace"" the nbrModTarget(target) with string ""789"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
4. allowUnknowFTN flag is not sold/blocked.
5. eftn is true and
6. 789 is not a short code
Notes:

Subscriber-Data : 1. ftnTransIndex value =52 is attached to the subcriber(sub5, sub6 , sub7 & sub100) with TIF-CSI. Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Request: Subscriber6 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (123) Subscriber5 sends ATM msg with FTNO (123) Subscriber7 sends USSD msg to subscriber100 with FTNO (491720391211007) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results : "1. RSS(to activate CFB for sub 6),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub5),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub7 to sub100) requests are successful.
2. Rule61 is applied and the translated FTNO is ""789"" for SCI(RSS) & ATM is in ""Unknown"" format.
3. Rule61 are applied and the translated FTNO is ""491720397891007"" for USSD is in ""Unknown"" Format.
4. Since ""allowUnknown"" is false, FTNO is converted to international format using existing HIC checks and translations. The translated FTNO's are ""9149172789 for SCI(RSS) & ATM and ""9149172491720397891007"" for USSD."
Remarks: "CC is assumed to be 49 NDC is assumed to be 172."

TestCase.name: TC3912_056
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_056
Goals: 1. Verify that the international FTNO's registration are successful when translated FTNO does not have National prefix, when FTN contains the same country code as HPLMN,if the allowFtnoWithoutNationalPrefix flag is ""true""; For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with unknown FTNO(2354678)& Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with unknown FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=56 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet53.
2. allowFtnoWithoutNationalPrefix flag is set to TRUE
3. allowUnknownFTN should be false.
4. eftn should be false.
Note:
1.Valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is not created in the database . A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet53"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule63.
2. Rule63 with with nbrRegExp ""^[1-9](3)"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Match) with the string ""81"" and nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
RSS, ATM call flows: match 912354678 --> 81354678
USSD callflow: match 91491720391211003 --> 8191720391211003
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =56 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub104) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (2354678) Subscriber2 sends ATM msg with FTNO (2354678) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber104 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 1),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub 104) requests are successful.
2. Rule63 is applied on the FTNO and after number translation FTNO becomes "354678" in ""Unknown"" format for SCI(RSS) & ATM.Existing HIC checks add CC to the FTNO and stores it as international FTNO(490391211001 & 490391211002) .
3. Rule63 are applied on the FTNO and after number translation FTNO becomes "8191720391211003" in ""Unknown"" format for USSD.Existing HIC checks add CC to the FTNO and stores it as international FTNO(490391211104).
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub104) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(2354678) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(490391211001) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (235467 | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(490391211002) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(490391211104) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_057
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_057
Goals: "Verify that the FTNO is truncated when the FTNO starts with an entry in inatPrefixTable;for a subscriber without TIF-CSI
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(1234512) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=57 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet54.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet54"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule64.
3. 8213 is an entry in inatPrefix Table.
4. Rulre64 with nbrRegExp ""^[8|9][0|1]"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Postmatch) with ""8213"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Note:
RSS, ATM call flows: match 811234512 --> 8182131
USSD callflow: match 91491720391211003 --> 918213
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =57 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub105) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (1234512) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (1234512) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber105 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.Registeration Fails with UDV.
2. Rule64 are applied on the FTNO and after number translation FTNO becomes "8213" for SCI(RSS) & ATM. This FTNO is truncated. This results in 0 byte FTNO. Hence the FTNO registration fails.
3. Rule64 are applied on the FTNO and after number translation FTNO becomes "8213" for USSD. This FTNO is truncated. This results in 0 byte FTNO. Hence the FTNO registration fails.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub105) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(1234512) | |----------------------------------->| | E_UDV | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (1234512 | |----------------------------------->| | E_UDV | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | E_SF | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_058
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_058
Goals: "Verify that the shortcode registration is successful if the shortcode is present in the ""serviceIndicator and short code translation"" table,when allowUnknownFTN flag is set to False if number translation converts FTNO(49172123) to a valid shortcode(123);For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172123)& Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
"1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=58 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet54.
2.Valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is not created in the database . A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet54"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule64.
3.allowUnknownFTN flag is set to False
4. Rule64 with nbrRegExp ""^8[0-1]?"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Postmatch) with ""444"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"".on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
5. 444 is a shortcode(ie valid NSR is present).An entry corresponding to the ShortCode is present in the ""short code translation"" table. Service Indicator =5.
Note:
RSS, ATM call flows: match 8149172123 --> 81444
USSD callflow: match 80491720391211003 --> 80444"
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =58 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub106) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172123) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber106 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 2),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 1),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub106) requests are successful.
2. Rule64 (RuleSet54) is applied and the translated unknown FTNO (444). The existing HIC checks will convert the FTNO to 4917251444 for RSS and ATM
3. Rule64 (RuleSet54) is applied and the translated unknown FTNO (444). The existing HIC checks will convert the FTNO to 4917251444 for USSD.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub106) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(4917251444) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(4917251444) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4917251444) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_060
TestCase.Description:

Goals: 1. Verify that the registration of FTNO fails when the length of the translated FTNO !=10 , if nanp is ""true"" and the allowUnknownFTN flag is set to ""False"" for a subscriber without TIF-CSI.

HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
"1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=60 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet56.

6. Rule68 with nbrRegExp ""^81 and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Postmatch) ""0123456789"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : match nonmatch 90491725689 ==> 81491725689 ==> 810123456789 match match 91491720391211003 ==> 81491720391211003 ==> 810123456789 "
