TestCase.name: TC3912_061
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_061
Goals: 1.Verify that the FTNO registration for a special pager system is successful with the National prefix attached to the number,if ""pagerNumNotEnlargeNDC"" flag is set to ""True"";For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(4919345) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=61 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet57.
2.Valid ruleset named ""RuleSet99"" is not created in the database . A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet57"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule69.
3. pagerNumNotEnlargeNDCand eftn flag is set to TRUE. allowUnknownFTN flag is set to True eftn is true.
4. Rule69 with nbrRegExp ""^9[0-1]"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModTarget(Match) with 819 nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : match 904919345 ==> 8194919345 match 91491720391211003 ==> 819491720391211003
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =61 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub109) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4919345) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4919345) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber109 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results
1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub 3),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub 2),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub 4) requests are successful.
2. The Rule69 is applied and the translated FTNO "94919345" for SCI(RSS) & ATM is in unknown format.
4. The Rule1 & Rule3 are applied and the translated FTNO "9491720391211003" for USSD is in unkown format.
5.Since the "pagerNumNotEnlargeNDC" is set to "True",the "8" is prefixed with the translated FTNO(^9) and the CC(49) is attached to the Number,the registered FTNO's are "49894919345" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "4989491720391211003" for USSD.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub109) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(4919345) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49894919345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (4919345) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49894919345) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4989491720391211003) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_063
Goals: "1. Verify that the FTNO registration is successful with the National prefix,if the eftn flag is set to ""True""; For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(48173567) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=63 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet59.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet59"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule71.
3. The eftn flag is set to true. allowUnknownFTN flag is set to false.
4. Rule71 with nbrRegExp ""^90?"" and action to ""Replace"" the target(match) with ""81"" nextStepType as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : RSS and ATM match 9048173567 ==> 8148173567
USSD match 90491720391211003 ==> 81491720391211003 "
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =63 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub111)without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (48173567) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (48173567) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber111 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results
"1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub1),ATM(to activate CFB for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub111) requests are successful.
2. The Rule1 & Rule3 are applied and the translated FTNO "48173567" for SCI(RSS) & ATM is in unknown format.
3. The Rule1 is applied and the translated FTNO "491720391211003" for USSD is in unkown format.
4.allowUnknownFTN flag is set to false and EFTN flag is ""true"",it converts Unknown FTN to International by adding CC+NDC.Therefore the registered FTNO are "4917248173567" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "49172491720391211003" for USSD."
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub111) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(48173567) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(4917248173567) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (48173567) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(4917248173567) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(49172491720391211003) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_064
Goals: "1.Verify that the registration of the FTNO is successful and CC is added to the translated unknown FTNO,if the retainNatPrefixinFTN flag is set to True and the translated unknown FTNO starts with digits present in mocNatPrefix table;for a subscriber without TIF-CSI. 2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(814539) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (80491720391211003)."
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=64 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet60.

Notes : RSS and ATM match 814961234 ==> 816714539
USSD match 81491720391211003 ==> 80671491720391211003 "

Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (814539) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (814539) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber112 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results
"1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub2),ATM(to activate CFB for sub 1),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub112) requests are successful.
2. The Rule72 is applied and the translated FTNO "6714539" for SCI(RSS) & ATM is in unknown format.
3. The Rule72 are applied and the translated FTNO "671491720391211003" for USSD is in unkown format.
4. The Resultant FTNO's after truncating "671" and adding the CC are "494539" for SCI(RSS) & ATM;"49491720391211003" for USSD."

TestCase.name: TC3912_065
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_065
Goals: 1. Verify that the FTNO registration is successful if the translated FTNO is in ""Unknown"" format.,When both the allowUnknownFTN and sendUnknownFtnAsInternational flag is set to ""True""; For a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(4961234) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=65 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet61.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet61"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule73.
3. allowUnknownFTN and sendUnknownFtnAsInternational flag is set to "True".
4. Rule72 with nbrRegExp "^9[0-1]" and action to "Replace" the target(match) with "81" and nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : RSS and ATM match 914961234 ==> 814961234
USSD match 91491720391211003 ==> 81491720391211003
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =65 is attached to the subcriber(sub1, sub2 , sub3 & sub113) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4961234) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4961234) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber113 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub2),ATM(to activate CFB for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub113) requests are successful.
2. Configured rules are applied on the FTNO's and are registered successfully.
3. The Rule72 is applied and the translated FTNO "4961234" for SCI(RSS) & ATM is in unknown format. Since sendUnknownFtnAsInternational is true, in R_RSS type is retuned as "international".
4. The Rule1 & Rule3 are applied and the translated FTNO "491720391211003" for USSD is in unknown format.(No impact on PUSSD)
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub113) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(4961234) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(4961234) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (4961234) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(4961234) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211003) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_068 - DU9155
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_068
Goals: 1. Verify that the FTNO translated is in International Format and the NOA is set to national using the Rules.For a subscriber with TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with Unknown FTNO(12abc) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with Unknown FTNO (491720391211007).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=4 with nbrTransIndex value=68 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet63.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet63"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule75.
3. Rule75 with nbrRegExp "[a-e]|[A-E]" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" the nbrModtarget(match) with string ""222"" and nextStepType as "Rule" and refNextStepId as ""Rule76"" on regEx match refNextStepId as "Rule76" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule76 which has nbrRegExp "^[8-9][0-1]" and nbrModType "Replace" the nbrModtarget(match) with "A1", nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Notes : RSS and ATM match match 9112abc ==> 9112222 ==> A112222
USSD nonmatch match 91491720391211007 ==> 91491720391211007 ==> A1491720391211007
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =68 is attached to the subcriber(sub5,sub6,sub7 & sub116) with TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber5 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (12abc) Subscriber6 sends ATM msg with FTNO (12abc) Subscriber7 sends USSD msg to subscriber116 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results :
1. RSS(to activate CFB for sub5),ATM(to activate CFD for sub6),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub7 to sub116) requests are successful and are registered successfully.
2.Rule75 & Rule76 (nbrContextType=2) are applied and the translated FTNO "12222" for SCI(RSS) & ATM. and the NOA is set to national . Existing HIC checks will append CC and convert the FTNO to "491222" in international format.
3.Rule75 & Rule76 (nbrContextType=2) are applied and the translated FTNO "491720391211007" for USSD. and the NOA is set to national Existing HIC checks will append CC and convert the FTNO to "49491720391211007" in international format.
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub116) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(12abc) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(491222) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (12abc) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(491222) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211007) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(49491720391211007) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_069
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_069
Goals: 1. Verify that in case after number translation, the FTNO is in internation format but contains a-e or A-E,Without using the rules the NOA is set to ""Unknown"" for a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(49172345) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=69 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet64.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet64"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule77.
3. Rule77 with nbrRegExp "[0-9]{2}$" and nbrModType to "Replace" the nbrModtarget(match) with string ""AeBc"" and nextStepType as "Rule" and refNextStepId as "Rule77" on regEx match refNextStepId as "Rule76" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule77 which has nbrRegExp "^[0-9]{2}" and nbrModType "Replace" the nbrModtarget(match) with "91", nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
5. allowUnknownFTN is true.
Notes : RSS and ATM match match 9049172345 ==> 90491723AeBc ==> 91491723AeBc
USSD match match 91491720391211003 ==> 914917203912110AeBc ==> 914917203912110AeBc
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex avlue =69 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2, sub3 and sub117) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (49172345) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (49172345) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber117 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results :
"1. RSS(to activate CFB for sub2),ATM(to activate CFNry for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub117) requests are successful and are registered successfully.
2. Translated FTNO is "91491723AeBc" for SCI(RSS) & ATM .Infobyte is International. Since the FTNO contains a-e/A-E, the FTNO type is converted ti unknown format. Now the FTNO is 491723AeBc
3. Translated FTNO "914917203912110AeBc" for USSD .Infobyte is International. Since the FTNO contains a-e/A-E, the FTNO type is converted ti unknown format. Now the FTNO is 4917203912110AeBc
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub117) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172345) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(491723AeBc) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172345) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(491723AeBc) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(4917203912110AeBc) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_103
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_103
Goals:
"1. Verify that registration of FTNO is successful when translated FTNO is a single digit no.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(4917211003) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003). "
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
"1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType=1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=103 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet81.
2.No valid ruleset RuleSet99 is created in the database. A valid ruleset named as RuleSet81 is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 4 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule103.
3.Rule103 with nbrRegExp ""110"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" nbrModTarget(Whole) with the string ""819""; refNextStepId as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
4. allowUnknown is TRUE.
Note:
RSS and ATM match 814917211003 ==> 819 USSD match 91491720391211003 ==> 819"
Subscriber :
1.ftnTransIndex=103 is attached for the subscribers(sub1, sub2 , sub3, sub133) .
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber133 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub2),ATM(to activate CFNrc for sub1),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub133) request is successful.
2.Rule103 is executed and RSS and ATM requests are successful with FTNO "9".
3.Rule103 is executed and USSD request is successful with FTNO 819.

TestCase.name: TC3912_089
TestCase.Description:

Goals: 1. Verify that FTNO is translated ,when nbrRegExp use tokens present in def-Token list for a subscriber with TIF-CSI .

TestCase.name: TC3912_093
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_093
Goals: 1.Verify that FTNO is translated when nbrRegExp uses Pre-Defined Token ""MSISDN"" using the basic msisdn for a multinumbering subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with FTNO(4987611456) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211032).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=93 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet70.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet70"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 3 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule90.
3. Rule90 with nbrRegExp "11" and nbrModType to "ReplaceWithToken" "%MSISDN%" nbrModTarget(whole); refNextStepId as "Rul91" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule91 with nbrRegExp "49" and nbrModType "Prefix" string "91" with nbrModTarget(match); refNextStepId as "finish" with nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
Note: MSISDN is a predefined token.For multinumbering subscriber the token value will be the basic msisdn.
RSS and ATM match match 804987611456 ==> 491720391211032 ==> 91491720391211032
USSD match match 91491720391211032 ==> 491720391211032 ==> 91491720391211032
Subscriber : 1. Multinumbering subscriber sub32[262020391211032] with misisdn32 for telephony(491720391211032),misisdn33 for SMS(491720391211033), msisdn34 for FAX(491720391211034),msisdn35 for CDA(491720391211035),msisdn36 for CDS(491720391211036) & provide CFB,CFNrc and CFNry.Also provide followme for the subscriber.
2. ftnTransIndex value =93 is attached to the subscriber without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber32 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4987611456) Subscriber32 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4987611456) Subscriber32 sends USSD msg to subscriber123 with FTNO (491720391211032) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub32),ATM(to activate CFB for sub32) will fail with E_UDV. PUSSR(FollowMe from sub32 to sub123) requests is successful.
2. Rule1 & Rule2 are applied and the transalated FTNO is "91491720391211032" for SCI(RSS) & ATM .
3. Rule1 & Rule2 are applied and the transalated FTNO is 91491720391211032 for USSD.

TestCase.name: TC3912_100
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_100
Goals: "1. Verify that registration of FTNO fails when subscriber has ss barring activated.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(4917211039) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211039). "
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=100 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet77.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet77"" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 4 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule98.
Notes:
3. Rule98 with nbrRegExp ""110"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" nbrModTarget(Match) with the string ""999""; refNextStepId as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.
RSS and ATM match 814917211039 ==> 814917299903
USSD match 91491720391211039 ==> 91491720391299939 "
Subscriber :
"1. A normal subscriber sub39[262020391211039, 491610391211039] is created with Telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB,CFNrc,CFD and CFNry.Also provide FollowMe.
2. Subscriber also has ss barring for speech as activated.
3. ftnTransIndex value =100 is attached to the subcriber(sub37) without TIF-CSI. "
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber130 with FTNO (491720391211037) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results
1.RSS(to activate CFU for sub39),ATM(to activate CFU for sub39),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub39 to sub130) request is successful.
2.RSS and ATM fails with E_SSI.
3.Rule98 is executed and USSD request is successful with FTNO 491720391299939 .

VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub039) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | UL(sub130) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(4917211039) | |----------------------------------->| | E_SSI | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (4917211039) | |----------------------------------->| | E_SSI | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211039) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391299939) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_101
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_101
Goals: " 1. Verify that registration of FTNO fails when subscriber has an RSI profile with BAIC attached.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with with FTNO(4917211040) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211040). "
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1.A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=101 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet78.
2. A valid ruleset named as ""RuleSet78 is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 4 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule98.
Notes:
3. Rule98 with nbrRegExp ""110"" and nbrModType to ""Replace"" nbrModTarget(Match) with the string ""999""; refNextStepId as ""finish"" and nbrEvalResult as ""success"" on regEx match, refNextStepId as ""Rule3"" on regEx nonmatch.

RSI:RSI_FFTNO Entity Number:HPLMN Roaming Plan Routing:RP_FFTNO Roaming Plan Standard:RP_FFTNO
RP :RP_FFTNO Assigned ODB Plans :ODB_FFTNO

3. ftnTransIndex value =101 is attached to the subcriber(sub40) without TIF-CSI. "

3.ATM is successful and 4917299940.

TestCase.name: TC3912_102
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_102
Goals:
1.Verify that for a MSS based MultiSIM member, registration is successful when FTNO is translated to group msisdn or to any other member msisdn.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with FTNO(8049110123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (91491720391211029).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType= 2 with nbrTransIndex value=100, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet23.
2. A valid ruleset named as "RuleSet23" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule1.
3. Rule1 with nbrRegExp "110" and nbrModType to "ReplaceWithToken" "%MSISDN%" nbrModTarget(whole); refNextStepId as "Rule2" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule3" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule2 with nbrRegExp "^49" and nbrModType to "Prefix" with string "91"; refNextStepId as "Rule3" with nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule4" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule3 with nbrRegExp "19$" and nbrModType to "replace" with string "23"; refNextStepId as "finish" nwith nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as "Rule4" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule4 which has nbrRegExp "20$" and and nbrModType to "Replace" with string "22", nextStepType as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success". Note: MSISDN is a predefined token. For multinumbering subscriber the token value will be the basic msisdn.
Subscriber :
1. MSS based subscribers sub27[262020391211027, 491720391211027], sub28[262020391211028, 491720391211028], sub29[262020391211029, 491720391211029], sub30[262020391211030, 491720391211030] sub31[262020391211031, 491720391211031] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB. Also provide follow me for the subscribers. Group msisdn is sub 32[491720391211032] 2.ftnTransIndex=102 is attached to the subcriber(sub 29) 3.ftnTransIndex=0 is attached to the subcriber(sub 27)"
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4917211040) Subscriber1 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4917211040) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber131 with FTNO (491720391211040) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results
1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub27),ATM(to activate CFB for sub27),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub29 to sub8) requests are successful.
2. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule3 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211032"" (group msisdn) for SCI(RSS) & ATM .
3. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule4 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211030"" (member msisdn) for USSD.""
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| UL(sub040) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | UL(sub131) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(4917211040) | |----------------------------------->| | E_SF | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (4917211040) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(4917299940) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211040) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391299940) | |<-----------------------------------|

TestCase.name: TC3912_023
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_023
Goals:
"1. Verify that only the existing HIC checks & FTNO conversions are applied when the nbrTransIndex value is not created for a subscriber without TIF-CSI.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with FTNO(49172123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (491720391211003).
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. Valid Number Translation NSR for context type=1 is not Created.
Subscriber : 1. ftnTransIndex value =0 is attached to the subscribers(sub1,sub2, sub3 and sub71) without TIF-CSI.
Request: Subscriber1 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber3 sends ATM msg with FTNO (4917211003) Subscriber3 sends USSD msg to subscriber71 with FTNO (491720391211003) to activate FOLLOWME
Expected Results 1.RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub1),ATM(to activate CFD for sub3),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub3 to sub71) requests are successful.
2.Only existing HIC checks & FTNO conversions are applied on the FTNO. 3. The registered FTNO's are "49172123" for SCI(RSS) & ATM and "491720391211003" for USSD."
Message Flow
VLR HLR-FE
| | | UL(sub071) | |----------------------------------->| | ISD | |<-----------------------------------| | R_ISD | |----------------------------------->| | R_UL | |<---------------------------------- | | | | | | | | RSS(49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_RSS(49172123) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | ATM (49172123) | |----------------------------------->| | R_ATM(49172123) | |<-----------------------------------| | | | | | | | PUSSR(491720391211003) | |----------------------------------->| | R_PUSSR | |<-----------------------------------| | | | SRI | |----------------------------------->| | R_SRI(491720391211003) | |<-----------------------------------|

Goals:

HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContext type=2 with nbrTransIndex value=104 & with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet81.
2. A valid ruleset named as RuleSet81 is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 4 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule120.
3. Rule120 with nbrRegExp "12" and nbrModType to "Replace" nbrModTarget(Whole) with the string "49120"; refNextStepId as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx match, refNextStepId as "finish" and nbrEvalResult as "success" on regEx nonmatch,
4. allowUnknown is TRUE.
Subscriber :
1.ftnTransIndex=104 is attached for the subscribers(sub134) .
Request: Subscriber2 sends SCI(RSS) msg with FTNO (491720391211001)
Expected Results
1.RSS(to activate CFB for sub134) request is successful.
2.Rule103 is executed and RSS and ATM requests are successful with FTNO "9".
3.Rule103 is executed and USSD request is successful with FTNO 819.

TestCase.name: TC3912_118 - DU9037
TestCase.Description:
TC NO:TC3912_102
Goals: "1.Verify that for a MSS based MultiSIM member, registration is successful when FTNO is translated to group msisdn or to any other member msisdn.
2. Registration request is sent for SCI(RSS) and ATM with FTNO(8049110123) & Follow-me registration request is sent for USSD with FTNO (91491720391211029). "
HLRFE-FF:ON PGW-FF:ON
Pre-requisites: "1. A valid Number Translation NSR is present for nbrContextType= 1 with nbrTransIndex value=0, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet99. and for nbrContextType= 2 with nbrTransIndex value=100, and with refnbrRuleSetName = RuleSet23. 2. No valid ruleset named """"RuleSet99"""". A valid ruleset named as """"RuleSet23"""" is created in the database, having maxRuleCount = 2 and refFirstNbrRuleName = Rule1.
3. Rule1 with nbrRegExp """"110"""" and nbrModType to """"ReplaceWithToken"""" """"%MSISDN%"""" nbrModTarget(whole); refNextStepId as """"Rule2"""" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as """"Rule3"""" on regEx nonmatch.
4. Rule2 with nbrRegExp """"^49"""" and nbrModType to """"Prefix"""" with string """"91""""; refNextStepId as """"Rule3"""" with nbrEvalResult as """"success"""" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as """"Rule4"""" on regEx nonmatch.
5. Rule3 with nbrRegExp """"19$"""" and nbrModType to """"Replace"""" with string """"23""""; refNextStepId as """"finish"""" with nbrEvalResult as """"success"""" on regEx match, and refNextStepId as """"Rule4"""" on regEx nonmatch.
6. Rule4 which has nbrRegExp """"20$"""" and and nbrModType to """"Replace"""" with string """"22"""", nextStepType as """"finish"""" and nbrEvalResult as """"success"""". Note: MSISDN is a predefined token. For multinumbering subscriber the token value will be the basic msisdn. "
Subscriber-Data : "1. MSS based subscribers sub27[262020391211027, 491720391211027], sub28[262020391211028, 491720391211028], sub29[262020391211029, 491720391211029], sub30[262020391211030, 491720391211030] sub31[262020391211031, 491720391211031] with telephony,SMS,FAX,CDA,CDS& provide CFB. Also provide follow me for the subscribers. Group msisdn is sub 32[491720391211032] 2.ftnTransIndex=102 is attached to the subcriber(sub 29) 3.ftnTransIndex=0 is attached to the subcriber(sub 27)"
Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Impacted Call flows: SCI(RSS) ATM USSD
Expected Results : " 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub27),ATM(to activate CFB for sub27),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub29 to sub8) requests are successful.
2. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule3 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211032"" (group msisdn) for SCI(RSS) & ATM .
3. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule4 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211030"" (member msisdn) for USSD."""

Allowed Map Versions:V1(Only USSD), V2,V3
Impacted Call flows: SCI(RSS) ATM USSD
Expected Results : " 1. RSS(to activate CFNrc for sub27),ATM(to activate CFB for sub27),PUSSR(FollowMe from sub29 to sub8) requests are successful.
2. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule3 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211032"" (group msisdn) for SCI(RSS) & ATM .
3. Rule1 ,Rule2 & Rule4 is applied and the transalated FTNO is ""491720391211030"" (member msisdn) for USSD."""

TestSuite.name: Deletion
TestSuite.Description:
1)Login info - create file common.h in spml/include directory and defines PGW_IP,PGW_PORT_SPML,PGW_PORT_SPML_NSR and PGW_PORT_DSML used by SUBSCRIBER Creation and deletion scripts.
2)SPML File Compilations - Compiled and build "*.its" in spml
3)copy ac.spml and subdata.spml from TestCases/HI45_03291_11_005/ to spml/spml001/ and run "*.cfg" to create subscriber.
4)copy ac.spml and subdata.spml from TestCases/HI45_03291_11_008/ to spml/spml001/ and run "*.cfg" to create subscriber. 3rd and 4th step execute using perl script
############################### Subscribers in this suite ####################################### 1. 9.
